thread.title: Arrieta, Cubs ready for Cardinals with NLDS tied at 1-all
thread.title_full: Arrieta, Cubs ready for Cardinals with NLDS tied at 1-all

title: Arrieta, Cubs ready for Cardinals with NLDS tied at 1-all
text:
> Top News Arrieta, Cubs ready for Cardinals with NLDS tied at 1-all St. Louis Cardinals' Matt Carpenter, right, talks with manager Mike Matheny during an NLDS baseball practice on Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015 in Chicago. The Cardinals will face the Chicago Cubs in Game 3 of the National League Division Series on Monday. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh)
